content: मह् I. {c1c} <ab>P.</ab>, {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (महति, महयतिते, महित) {@--1@} To honour, respect, hold in great esteem, worship, revere, value greatly; गोप्तारं न निधीनां महयंति महेश्वरं विबुधाः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; जयश्रीविन्यस्तैर्महित इव मंदारकुसुमैः <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; स्त्री पुमानित्यनास्थैषा वृत्तं हि महितं सतां <ls>Ku. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 5.">24</ls>; <ls>Bk. 10. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 25</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 49.</ls> {@--2@} To delight, gladden. {@--3@} To increase, aggrandize {@--4@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) To delight in. {@--5@} To be honoured. (<ab>Ved.</ab> in the last four senses) II. {1} A (महते) To grow or increase.
